title: How to connect Raspberry Pi Zero to WiFi - Quora

response.answer_text: For my Pi Zeros I have two methods. One of these adapters allows me to plug in a USB to WiFi adapter.microUSB OTG Adapter Shim for Pi Zero or one if these allows a wired connection.Three Port USB Hub with Ethernet. The second method is the easiest way to get the PiZero set up for wi fi as you can also plug in a mouse/keyboard adapter to sort out the credentials for a wifi connection. There is also this from Pi Hut. Ethernet Hub and USB Hub w/ Micro USB OTG Therer is another answer that explains the method wirh editing wpa_supplicant.conf but that is more difficult. And time consuming.

If you have the Raspberry Pi Zero without WiFi then you can buy a WiFi dongle to connect to WiFi. If you have the wireless version or the dongle but don't have an operating system with a GUI then you can follow the steps from How To: Connect your Raspberry Pi to WiFi | Raspberry Pi HQ. Or you follow a WiFi tutorial for the operating system you are running on your Pi.
